message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a starting price of $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only consider a price closer to $8,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, thanks for coming down, but $17,000 is still more than I'm looking to spend.  Could you do $10,000?  If not, I may have to explore other options.
